title: Coreference Resolution (OntoNotes)
description: Link pronouns and noun phrases to the entities they refer to in text. Based on the OntoNotes coreference annotation guidelines and CoNLL shared tasks. Identify mention spans and cluster coreferent mentions together.
citation:
@inproceedings{pradhan-etal-2012-conll,
    title = "{C}o{NLL}-2012 Shared Task: Modeling Multilingual Unrestricted Coreference in {O}nto{N}otes",
    author = "Pradhan, Sameer  and Moschitti, Alessandro  and Xue, Nianwen  and Uryupina, Olga  and Zhang, Yuchen",
    booktitle = "Joint Conference on EMNLP and CoNLL - Shared Task",
    month = jul,
    year = "2012",
    address = "Jeju Island, Korea",
    publisher = "Association for Computational Linguistics",
    url = "https://aclanthology.org/W12-4501",
    pages = "1--40"
}
